orbotix.robot.sensor
Class LocatorData

java.lang.Object
  orbotix.robot.sensor.LocatorData

public class LocatorData
extends java.lang.Object

Current Sphero location data based on 0,0 at the start of Locator Streaming.

SensorControl.addLocatorListener(orbotix.sphero.LocatorListener)
